dcterms:creator: Sheng Zhang
Xin Zhang
Hui Wang
Lixiang Guo
Shanshan Liu
dcterms:description: The cMedQA V2.0 dataset was constructed from an online Chinese medical health community and is used for Chinese medical question-answer matching. It contains questions and answers provided by real users, with an average of 49 characters for questions and 101 characters for answers.
dcterms:title: cMedQA V2.0

dcterms:creator: Sheng Zhang
X. Zhang
H. Wang
J. Cheng
P. Li
Z. Ding
dcterms:description: The cMedQA V1.0 dataset is the initial version of cMedQA V2.0, collected for Chinese medical question answering. It contains a set of questions and answers with detailed statistics on the number of characters and the distribution of questions and answers.
dcterms:title: cMedQA V1.0
